text: AFTER BREAKING THE RECORD FOR FEMALE ARTIST WITH THE MOST BILLBOARD HOT 100 HITS, GLOBAL SUPERSTAR NICKI MINAJ IS SET TO OPEN THE “ 2017 BILLBOARD MUSIC AWARDS ” Minaj to be joined by Lil Wayne, Jason Derulo and David Guetta for Epic 9 - Minute Performance The “ 2017 Billboard Music Awards ” will broadcast LIVE on BOTH COASTS from T - Mobile Arena In Las Vegas on SUNDAY, MAY 21st at 8 : 00 p. m. ET / 5 : 00 p. m. PT on ABC Click HERE for digital
